website_summaries.verdict: Ecco shoes are known to provide foot comfort. Among the brand’s promising footwear is the Ecco BIOM Fjuel Tie. One of the brand’s shoes that are equipped with the BIOM technology, it empowers the foot by providing enhanced comfort as well as performance.It delivers reliable comfort that people with plantar fasciitis greatly benefited. Apart from comfort, it also possesses undeniable beauty that men and women can wear to match different casual ensembles.
pros: The Ecco BIOM Fjuel Tie is appreciated by several customers for its silhouette that is often described as “stylish,” “nice-looking, “cute” and “beautiful.”
A significant population of wearers exclaimed how happy they are with the sneaker’s comfortable feel
It is good for long walks and for people with plantar fasciitis, others noted
Several buyers testified how well-made and durable the shoe is
A couple of users loved the shoe’s cushioning and impact protection
Among the low-top Ecco footwear, this sneaker is highly recommended by many reviewers
The BIOM Fjuel Tie provides sufficient foot breathability, noted by a few
Some purchasers attested that this shoe provides decent arch support
It strengthens the feet because the soles are hard and ergonomic
This sneaker is available in different beautiful colorways for men and women
cons: Concerning the width, the Ecco BIOM Fjuel Tie fits narrow as muttered by some of the men and women who tried the shoe
When it comes to the sneaker’s length, a couple of reviewers noted that it fits bigger than expected

customer_reviews.title: Narrow feet and orthotics
customer_reviews.text: The medium width sneaker works for me, and I have medium/narrow feet and narrow heels. Most other medium width sneakers are too wide. This sneaker has a removable insole, so orthotics can be used.
customer_reviews.author: PAS

customer_reviews.title: For a narrow foot only
customer_reviews.text: It's not often that I can take a pair of shoes out of box, lace them up and have them comfortable enough to go for a long walk. These are the shoes!! Everything fit better than expected. Since I have narrow feet, they fit perfectly. If you need something with a wider width, please check the size and width before buying. the other interesting thing about these shoes was that the footbed had the exact same profile as my orthotics, so I didn't need to try and squeeze them in. This is really a quality shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4th pair purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have been a nurse for 28 years and was looking for something extra special to protect my feet, along with my knees. I have used all brands of tennis shoes over the years but this style of Ecco tennis shoe is by far for the best. I am on my fourth pair of this tennis shoe. This tennis shoe really helps stabilize your feet and prevents your foot from turning in and out which in return affects your knees. I will continue to purchase this shoe as long as it is available. Also, years ago my chiropractor told me to purchase this brand of shoe but I did not listen. I should of bought this shoe year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a walking shoe that would help me avoid plantar fasciitis. Running shoes that I had worn for years just didn't provide the support. This is a comfortable and stylish shoe that provides that support.
customer_reviews.author: K. Weiner

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these shoes! They are perfect for someone who has high arches and walks a lot for their job or outside of their job.Mine lasted an entire year before they broke down and I got them again. These shoes are a touch narrow and I would recommend to someone with medium or narrow feet, NOT wide feet
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Can always count on Ecco!
customer_reviews.text: Until recently, I never would even consider buying shoes online, without being able to try them on. But Ecco shoes are always consistent, I knew what I wanted, I ordered them and they fit like a charm. Thank you from me and my happy feet.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T. Fitzsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought for $56 on Zullily. The soles are hard and ergonomic, it strengthens your feet and makes them strong and not hurting
customer_reviews.author: Eleyon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They look good. I would have preferred all black, but the variation of black/silver looks good, and the violet trim is zippy. VERY comfortable for all day wear and moderate walking, gym use. I walk every day, but haven't done any challenging hikes in these shoes. They are perfect with standard thickness socks, I'd need a larger size with heavier socks.
customer_reviews.author: Majara

customer_reviews.title: These are really cute...however, they are cut very narrow
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I pulled them from the box, I knew they would be narrow. The front of the shoe is cut almost like a high heel for women. Have never seen a running shoe with this cut! I have a pretty narrow foot so I wondered how they would fit...I usually get a M width and then wear a sock with a lot of support and thickness so my foot doesn't slide around...so I thought just maybe these would work. But no dice. Would have to shave off ends of toes to make these work. Super narrow. not sure who would ever be able to wear these shoes. Too bad as the color and overall style is very cute
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great support, my planterfaciatis is pain free
customer_reviews.text: Great support , my planterfaciatis is pain free . Lots of compliments on color
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For an ECCO and the price, very cheaply made. The tongue of the shoes is paper thin and I can foresee ripping within a month. The shoe also has barely any tread. I have narrow feet and even this shoe is too narrow. Can’t return because I wore once. That’s about all its going to be. Very SAD.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Leiferman

customer_reviews.title: Not like the shoes I was accustomed to
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn ECCOs for years, but they were seeming too short as I got older, so I ordered this pair 1/2 size longer than previous shoes. I am VERY disappointed with these shoes because my toes rub against the outer edge of the shoe. I bought a leather pair for winter and that pair has the same problem. My toes rubbed on the outer edge and the heels slip. Now I need to find a different shoe manufacturer. I am so disappointed with the ECCO brand.
customer_reviews.author: dogwalker

customer_reviews.title: Holds us awesome !!
customer_reviews.text: I had my previous pair for 8 yrs. loved loved them. My tread was definitely in need of a new pair. Since the virus the boarders were shut down I couldn’t reorder. Sold out on every site I went. I had to purchase a different brand. Best shoe I ever had. I walk 5 miles a day and have back issues. I will miss your product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is so comfortable - Ecco does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was in Germany and bought these shoes as I cannot wear Nike or high end shoes but Ecco was truly a surprise. I own 4 pair. Trouble is they don't sell the shoe I like the most here. I ordered a pair here in US and although they are great shoes but seem to be more narrow. I've bought the other pairs in Germany thru store or Anazon which are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Winter

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to find a shoe that really fits my foot.
customer_reviews.text: I'm have only been wearing this shoe for a short time but am very pleased with the way it fits across my arch. I have a narrow foot with a falling arch so need a shoe that will hold my orthotic in place and support my foot. The toe shape is just right to accommodate my longer second toe. I very much like the trim shape that gives me flexibility as I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an American 9.5 and the 41 fits perfectly. It's a real SHOE, not a cheap sneaker you toss after two years. Really love it.
customer_reviews.author: The Launcher

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Cute, comfortable, well-made. My go-to shoe for walking. Removable insole allows for a custom insole to be used. Consistent sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great support. I have bad knees and these shoes give a great relief for me. Very comfortable, feel light on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Holvick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those with planter fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I have planter fasciitis and needed a tennis shoe that would not hurt my feet. I added support inserts to these and they are perfect. Recently I went on a trip that required lots of walking and these shoes enabled me to walk long distances pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: No arch supports!
customer_reviews.text: Did not even try them on. These do not have the good arch support footbeds that I experienced on previous Biom purchases in department store. I buy ECCO because of those excellent arch supports.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They would be a great shoe for someone that doesn’t mind the light blue color.
customer_reviews.text: Great look, fit and comfort but this color (light blue) doesn’t work for me. I would buy it in a tan or another color that goes well with almost any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: emmy67

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great customersservice and good product. The perfect shoe, my wife loves them.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Ottini

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my back from hurting when I walk any distance.
customer_reviews.text: Ecco is my go to walking shoe. I have been wearing them for almost 20 years. A great, consistent product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Another superior shoe from Ecco
customer_reviews.text: I found the Ecco Women's Biom Fjuel Band Walking Shoe to be very comfortable and stylish. I have been wearing Ecco shoes for years as they provide outstanding support and comfort for all-day wear. I highly recommend this walking shoe especially if you walk on hard tile, pavement or other similar surfaces for many hours during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and attractive. Because I had a very similar one, I felt comfortable ordering the same size on line, and was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: happy reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: ECCO does it again with a great shoe. I am always confident in the sizing and have never been disappointed with ECCO. Light weight, good support and very comfortable. I would certainly purchase these again. The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Ecco Bioms
customer_reviews.text: Love Ecco Bioms! I wear size 8 1/2 and these fit perfectly! I walk 3 miles a day, 5 days a week and my previous pair lasted 2 1/2 years. Ultra comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: kim diatlovich

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fell apart after several months
customer_reviews.text: Shoes caused terrible blister on back heel when breaking them in, then broke in the toe several months later. Have had Ecco shoes before and loved them, but not now.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio de Pedis

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft leather and good Velcro fit that the soles are very hard for walking.
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft leather and good Velcro fit that the soles are very hard for walking.
customer_reviews.author: imollyq

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes--super comfortable but run a little large
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes--super comfortable but run a little large. I ordinarily get a size 7 for athletic shoes but will try a 6.5 and hope that it fits!
customer_reviews.author: Coopdedoo

customer_reviews.title: very supportive
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Ecco sneakers.and I love them because they keep my feet from pronating. In the past I have had plantar facscitis and these shoes keep this painful condition in check.
customer_reviews.author: judithbowman

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sneakers. This is my second pair. Would buy again. Looks like a casual shoe rather than a sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Aerobics

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, profile, and especially the overall fit. No pain after walking miles!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ecco shoes
customer_reviews.text: Golf, knee issue so can not have regular golf shoe
customer_reviews.author: JHASHEVILLE

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fit!
customer_reviews.text: These Ecco shoes are perfect for daily walks and hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. No breaking in necessary. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Carrithers

product_meta.title: ECCO Women's Biom Fjuel Tie Sneaker Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Women?s Ecco, Biom Fjuel Tie Lace up Sneakers This sporty sneaker is a must have Manmade and fabric upper Lace up closure for a secure fit with a padded collar for added support Fabric lining Removable cushioned footbed for added comfort Textured rubber outsole for added traction
feature_bullets: Bonded upper construction offers glove-like fit and necessary support for a natural feel when working out
Soft strobel insert underneath the inlay sole enhances the cushioning comfort
Direct-injected pu midsole foam and biom last, providing long-lasting cushioning and outstanding walking comfort
A low-to-the-ground sole construction provides a natural position for the foot and excellent ground adaptation
Flexible tpu sole with rubber inserts for lightweight and optimal grip
